GSP33brssbh3u:353: yathā kaścidvṛkṣamārohati puṣpaphalopādānāyaiva na niṣprayojanaṃ nāpi patanāyaiva /
GSP33brssbh3u:356: te tu saṃyamanaṃ yamālayamavagāhya svaduṣkṛtānurūpā yāmīryātanā anubhūya punarevemaṃ lokaṃ pratyavaronti /
GSP33brssbh3u:359: tathāhi yamavacanasarūpā śrutiḥ prayatāmaniṣṭādikāriṇāṃ yamavaśyatāṃ darśayati- 'na sāṃparāyaḥ pratibhāti bālaṃ pramādyantaṃ vittamohena mūḍham
GSP33brssbh3u:360: ayaṃ loko nāsti para iti mānī punaḥ punarvaśamāpadyate me' (kaṭha. 2.6) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:365: apica manuvyāsaprabhṛtayaḥ śiṣṭāḥ saṃyamane pure yamāyattaṃ kapūyakarmavipākaṃ smaranti nāciketopākhyānādiṣu api ca sapta |
GSP33brssbh3u:366: apica sapta narakā rauravapramukhā duṣkṛtaphalopabhogabhūmitvena smaryante paurāṇikaiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:370: yāvatā teṣu rauravādiṣvanye citraguptādayo nānādhiṣṭhātāraḥ smaryanta iti
GSP33brssbh3u:374: yamaprayuktā eva hi te citraguptādayo 'dhiṣṭhātāraḥ smaryante // 16 //
GSP33brssbh3u:376: pañcāgnividyāyām 'vettha yathāsau loko na saṃpūryate' (chā. 5.3.3) ityasya praśnasya prativacanāvasare śrūyate- 'athaitayoḥ pathorna katareṇacana tānīmāni kṣudrāṇyasakṛdāvartīni bhūtāni bhavanti jāyasva mriyasvetyetattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ tenāsau loko na saṃpūryate' (chā.
GSP33brssbh3u:381: vidyākarmaṇī hi devayānapitṛyāṇayoḥ pathoḥ pratipattau prakṛte /
GSP33brssbh3u:382: 'tadya itthaṃ viduḥ' iti vidyā tayā pratipattavyo devayānaḥ panthāḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:384: 'iṣṭāpūrte dattam' (chā. 5.10.1,3) iti karma tena pratipattavyaḥ pitṛyāṇaḥ panthāḥ prakīrtitaḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:386: etaduktaṃ bhavati- ye na vidyāsādhanena devayāne patyadhikṛtā nāpi karmaṇā pitṛyāṇe teṣāmeṣa kṣudrajantulakṣaṇo 'sakṛdāvartī tṛtīyaḥ panthā bhavatīti
GSP33brssbh3u:389: te 'pi candrabimbamāruhya tato 'varuhya kṣudrajantutvaṃ pratipatsyanta iti
GSP33brssbh3u:392: apica sarveṣu prayatsu candralokaṃ prāpnuvatsvasau lokaḥ prayadbhiḥ saṃpūryetetyataḥ praśnaviruddhaṃ prativacanaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:393: tathāhi prativacanaṃ dātavyaṃ yathāsau loko na saṃpūryate /
GSP33brssbh3u:399: sthānaṃ tenāsau loko na saṃpūryate' (chā. 5.10.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:404: ye vai kecidadhikṛtā asmāllokātprayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchantīti // 17 //
GSP33brssbh3u:409: na tṛtīye sthāne dehalābhāya pañcasaṃkhyāniyama āhutīnāmādartavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:411: tathāhyantareṇaivāhutisaṃkhyāniyamaṃ varṇitena prakāreṇa tṛtīyasthānaprāptirupalabhyate 'jāyasva mriyasvetyetattṛtīyaṃ sthānam'
GSP33brssbh3u:413: apica 'pañcamyāmāhutāvāpaḥ puruṣavacaso bhavanti' (chā. 5.3.3) iti manuṣyaśarīrahetutvenāhutisaṃkhyā saṃkīrtyate na
GSP33brssbh3u:415: apica pañcamyāmāhutāvapāṃ puruṣavacastvamupadiśyate nāpañcamyāmāhutau puruṣavacastvaṃ pratiṣidhyate, vākyasya dvyarthatādoṣāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:416: tatra yeṣāmārohāvarohau saṃbhavatasteṣāṃ pañcamyāmāhutau deha udbhaviṣyati
GSP33brssbh3u:422: dhṛṣṭadyumnādīnāṃ tu yoṣitpuruṣaviṣaye dve apyāhutī na staḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:424: balākāpyantareṇaiva retaḥsekaṃ garbhaṃ dhatta iti lokarūḍhiḥ // 19 //
GSP33brssbh3u:426: apica caturvidhe bhūtagrāme jarāyujāṇḍajasvedajodbhijjalakṣaṇe svedajodbhijjayorantareṇaiva grāmyadharmamutpattidarśanādāhutisaṃkhyānādaro bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:429: nanu 'teṣāṃ khalveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ trīṇyeva bījāni bhavanti aṇḍajaṃ
GSP33brssbh3u:431: atra trividha eva bhūtagrāmaḥ śrūyate kathaṃ caturvidhatvaṃ bhūtagrāmasya pratijñātamiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:434: 'āṇḍajaṃ jīvajamujadbhijam' (chā. 6.3.1) ityatra tṛtīyenodbhijjaśabdenaiva svedajopasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtaḥ pratyetavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:436: sthāvarodbhedāttu vilakṣaṇo jaṅgamodbheda ityanyatra svedajodbhijjayorbhedavāda ityavirodhaḥ FN: saṃśokajaṃ svedajam /
GSP33brssbh3u:442: tatreyamavarohaśrutirbhavati- 'athaicamevādhvānaṃ punarnivartante yathetamākāśamākāśādvāyuṃ vāyirbhūtvā dhūmo bhavati dhūmo bhūtvābhraṃ bhavatyabhraṃ bhūtvā megho bhūtvā pravarṣati' (chā. 5.10.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:450: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ākāśādisāmyaṃ pratipadyanta iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:451: candramaṇḍale yadaṃmayaṃ śarīramupabhogārthamārabdhaṃ tadupabhogakṣaye sati pravilīyamānaṃ sūkṣmamākāśasamaṃ bhavati tato vāyorvaśameti tato dhūmādibhiḥ saṃpṛcyata iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:471: tathāhi vrīhyādibhāvāpatteranantaraṃ viśinaṣṭi- 'ato vai khalu durniṣprapataram'
GSP33brssbh3u:475: tadatra duḥkhaṃ niṣprapatanaṃ pradarśayanpūrveṣu sukhaṃ niṣprapatanaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:482: tasminnevārohe pravarṣaṇānantaraṃ paṭhyate- 'ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣadhivanaspatayastilamāṣā iti jāyante' (chā. 5.10.6) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:484: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimasminnavadhau sthāvarajātyāpannāḥ sthāvarasukhaduḥkhabhājo 'nuśāyino bhavatyāhosvitkṣetrajñāntarādhiṣṭhiteṣu sthāvaraśarīreṣu saṃśleṣamātraṃ gacchantīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:492: yathā śvayoniṃ vā sūkarayoniṃ vā camḍālayoniṃ veti mukhyamevānuśayināṃ śvādijanma tatsukhaduḥkhānvitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:493: evaṃ vrīhyādiṣu saṃsargamātramanuśayinaḥ pratipadyante na tatsukhaduḥkhānvitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:495: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ anyairjīvairadhiṣṭhiteṣu vrīhyādiṣu saṃsargamātramanuśayinaḥ pratipadyante na tatsukhaduḥkhabhājo bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:503: yathākāśādiṣu pravarṣaṇānteṣu na kañcitkarmavyāpāraṃ parāmṛśatyevaṃ vrīhyādijanmanyapi /
GSP33brssbh3u:505: yatra tu sukhaduḥkhabhāktvamabhipraiti parāmṛśati tatra karmavyāpāraṃ ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā iti ca /
GSP33brssbh3u:506: apica mukhye 'nuśayināṃ vrīhyādijanmani vrīhyādiṣu lūyamāneṣu kaṇḍyamāneṣu pacyamāneṣu bhakṣyamāṇeṣu ca tadabhimānino 'nuśayinaḥ pravaseyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:507: yo hi jīvo yaccharīramabhimanyate sa tasminpīḍyamāne pravasatīti prasiddham /
GSP33brssbh3u:515: yatpunaruktaṃ paśuhiṃsādiyogādaśuddhamādhvarikaṃ karma tasyāniṣṭamapi phalamavakalpata ityato mukhyamevānuśayināṃ vrīhyādijanmāstu tatra gauṇī kalpanānarthiketi tatparihriyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:517: ayaṃ dharmo 'yamadharma iti śāstrameva vijñāne kāraṇam /
GSP33brssbh3u:519: yasmindeśe kāle nimitte ca yo dharmo 'nuṣṭhīyate sa eva deśakālanimittāntareṣvadharmo bhavati
GSP33brssbh3u:520: tena śāstrādṛte dharmādharmaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ na kasyacidasti /
GSP33brssbh3u:521: śāstrācca hiṃsānugrahādyātmako jyotiṣṭomo dharma ityavadhāritaḥ sa kathamaśuddha iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssbh3u:522: nanu 'na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtāni' iti śāstrameva bhūtaviṣayāṃ hiṃsāmadharma ityavagamayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:528: tena na tasya pratirūpaṃ phalaṃ jātisthāvaratvam /
GSP33brssbh3u:533: itaśca vrīhyādisaṃśleṣamātraṃ tadbhāvo yatkāraṇaṃ vrīhyādibhāvasyānantaramanuśayināṃ retaḥsigbhāva āmnāyate - 'yo yo hyannamatti yo retaḥ siñcati tadbhūya eva bhavati' (chā. 5.10.6) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:540: atha retaḥsigbhāvasyānantaraṃ yonau niṣikte retasi yoneradhikaśarīramanuśayināmanuśayaphalopabhogāya jāyata ityāha śāstram -
GSP33brssbh3u:542: tasmādapyavagamyate nāvarohe vrīhyādibhāvāvasare taccharīrameva sukhaduḥkānvitaṃ bhavatīti
GSP33brssbh3u:550: atikrīnte pāde pañcāgnividyāmudāhṛtya jīvasya saṃsāragatiprabhedaḥ prapañcitaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:552: idamāmananti- 'sa yatra prasvapiti' (bṛ. 4.3.9) ityupakramya 'na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavantyatha rathānrathayogānpathaḥ sṛjate'
GSP33brssbh3u:554: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ prabodha iva svapne 'pi pāramārthikī sṛṣṭirāhosvinmāyāmayīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:565: nirmātāramātmānamāmananti- 'ya eṣa supteṣu jāgarti kāmaṃ kāmaṃ puruṣo
GSP33brssbh3u:567: putrādayaśca tatra kāmā abhipreyante kāmyanta iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:570: 'śatāyuṣaḥ putrapautrānvṛṇīṣva' (ka. 1.23) iti prakṛtyānte 'kāmānāṃ tvā kāmabhājaṃ karomi' (ka. 1.24) iti prakṛteṣu tatra tatra putrādiṣu kāmaśabdasya prayuktatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:573: tadviṣaya eva ca vākyaśeṣo 'pi- 'tadeva śukraṃ tadbrahma tadevāmṛtamucyate
GSP33brssbh3u:574: tasmiṃllokāḥ śritāḥ sarve tadu nātyeti kaścana'' (ka. 5.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:575: prājñakartṛkā ca sṛṣṭistathyarūpā samadhigatā jāgaritāśrayā tathā svapnāśrayāpi sṛṣṭirbhavitumarhati
GSP33brssbh3u:576: tathāca śrutiḥ - atho khalvāhurjāgaritadeśa evāsyaiṣa iti yāni hyeva
GSP33brssbh3u:577: jāgratpaśyati tāni suptaḥ (bṛ. 4.3.14) iti svapnajāgaritayoḥ samānanyāyatāṃ śrāvayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:593: sa īyate 'mṛto yatra kāmam' (bṛ. 4.3.12) iti sthitigatipratyayabhedaśca nāniṣkrānte jantau sāmañjasyāmaśnuvīteti /
GSP33brssbh3u:595: nahi suptasya jantoḥ kṣaṇamātreṇa yojanaśatāntaritaṃ deśaṃ paryetuṃ viparyetuṃ ca tataḥ sāmarthyaṃ saṃbhāvyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:596: kvacicca pratyāgamanavarjitaṃ svapnaṃ śrāvayati kuruṣvahamadya śayāno nidrayābhiplutaḥ svapne pañcālānabhigataścāsminpratibuddhaśceti /
GSP33brssbh3u:597: dehāccedapeyātpañcāleṣu pratihudhyeta na tānasāvabhigata iti kuruṣveva tu pratibudhyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:598: yena cāyaṃ dehena deśāntaramaśnuvāno manyate tamanye pārśvasthāḥ śayanadeśa eva paśyanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:599: yathābhūtāni cāyaṃ deśāntarāṇi svapne paśyati na tāni tathābhūtānyeva bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:601: darśayati ca śrutirantareva dehe svapnam- 'sa yatraitatsvapnyayā carati'
GSP33brssbh3u:604: yo hi vasannapi śarīre na tena prayojanaṃ karoti sa bahiriva śarīrādbhavatīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:606: kālavisaṃvādo 'pi ca svapne bhavati rajanyāṃ supto vāsaraṃ bhārate varṣe manyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:608: nimittānyapi ca svapne na buddhaye karmaṇe vocitāni vidyante /
GSP33brssbh3u:610: rathādinirvartane 'pi kuto 'sya nimeṣamātreṇa sāmarthyaṃ dāruṇī vā /
GSP33brssbh3u:614: ratho 'yamiti hi kadācitsvapne nirdhāritaḥ kṣaṇena manuṣyaḥ saṃpadyate
GSP33brssbh3u:616: spaṣṭaṃ cābhāvaṃ rathādīnāṃ svapne śrāvayati śāstram - ''na tatra rathā na
GSP33brssbh3u:622: sūcakaśca hi śruter ācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ |
GSP33brssbh3u:626: tathāhi śrūyate - 'yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu striyaṃ svapneṣu paśyati /
GSP33brssbh3u:627: samṛddhiṃ tatra jānīyāttasminsvapnadarśane' (chā. 5.2.9) tathā puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇadantaṃ paśyati sa enaṃ hanti ityevamādibhiḥ svapnairacirajīvitvamāvedyata iti śrāvayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:628: ācakṣate ca svapnādhyāyavidaḥ - 'kuñjarārohaṇādīni svapne dhanyāni kharayānādīnyadhanyāni' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:630: tatrāpi bhavatu nāma sūcyamānasya vastunaḥ satyatvaṃ, sūcakasya tu strīdarśanāderbhavatyeva vaitathyaṃ bādhyamānatvādityabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:632: yaduktam 'āha hi' iti tadevaṃ sati bhāktaṃ vyākhyātavyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:633: yathā lāṅgalaṃ gavādīnudvahatīti nimittamātratvādevamucyate, natu pratyakṣameva lāṅgalaṃ gavādīnudvahati
GSP33brssbh3u:634: evaṃ nimittamātratvādevātsupto rathādīnsṛjate sa hi karteti cocyate, natu pratyakṣameva supto rathādīnsṛjati /
GSP33brssbh3u:636: apica jāgarite viṣayendriyasaṃyogādādityādijyotirvyatikarāccātmanaḥ svayañjyotiṣṭvaṃ durvivecanamiti tadvivecanāya svapna upanyastaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:637: tatra yadi rathādisṛṣcivacanaṃ śrutyā nīyeta tadā svayañjyotiṣṭvaṃ na nirṇītaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:638: tasmādrathādyabhāvavacanaṃ śrutyā rathādisṛṣṭivacanaṃ tu bhaktyeti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:642: śrutyantare 'svayaṃ vihatya svayaṃ nirmāya svena bhāsā jyotiṣā prasvapiti'
GSP33brssbh3u:644: ihāpi 'ya eṣa supteṣu jāgarti' (ka. 5.8) iti prasiddhānuvajjīva evāyaṃ
GSP33brssbh3u:646: tasya tu vākyaśeṣeṇa tadeva śukraṃ tadbrahmeti jīvabhāvaṃ vyāvartya brahmabhāva upadiśyate - 'tattvamasi' (chā. 6.9.4) ityādivaditi na brahmaprakaraṇaṃ virudhyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:656: parābhidhyānāt tu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau |
GSP33brssbh3u:658: tatraivaṃ sati yathāgnivisphuliṅgayoḥ samāne dahanaprakāśanaśaktī bhavata evaṃ jīveśvarayorapi jñānaiśvaryaśaktī, tataśca jīvasya jñānaiśvaryavaśātsāṃkalpikī svapne rathādisṛṣṭirbhaviṣyatīti atrocyate- satyapi jīveśvarayoraṃśāṃśibhāve pratyakṣameva
GSP33brssbh3u:663: tatpunastirohitaṃ satparameśvaramabhidhyāyato yatamānasya jantorvidhūtadhvāntasya timiratiraskṛteva dṛkśaktirauṣadhavīryādīśvaraprasādātsaṃsiddhasya kasyacidevāvirbhavati na svabhāvata eva sarveṣāṃ jantūnām /
GSP33brssbh3u:664: kutaḥ - tato hīśvarāddhetorasya jīvasya bandhamokṣau bhavataḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:677: asti cātropamā yathāgnerdahanaprakāśanasaṃpannasyāpyaraṇitasya dahanaprakāśane tirohite bhavato yathā vā bhasmacchannasya /
GSP33brssbh3u:680: nanvasya eva jīva īśvarādastu tiraskṛtajñānaiśvaryatvātkiṃ dehayogakalpanayā /
GSP33brssbh3u:684: 'tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo' (chā. 6.9.4) iti ca jīvāyopadiśatīśvarātmatvam
GSP33brssbh3u:686: ataśca na sāṃkalpikī jīvasya svapne rathādisṛṣṭirghaṭate /
GSP33brssbh3u:687: yadi ca sāṃkalpikī svapne rathādisṛṣṭiḥ syānnaivāniṣṭaṃ kaścitsvapnaṃ paśyet /
GSP33brssbh3u:689: yatpunaruktaṃ jāgaritadeśaśrutiḥ svapnasya satyatvaṃ sthāpayatīti na tatsāmyavacanaṃ satyatvābhiprāyaṃ svayañjyotiṣṭvavirodhāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:698: kvacicchrūyate- 'tadyatraitatsuptaḥ samastaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānātyāsu tadā nāḍīṣu sṛpo bhavati' (chā. 8.6.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:699: anyatra tu nāḍīrevānukramya śrūyate - 'tābhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati śete'
GSP33brssbh3u:701: tathānyatra nāḍīrevānukramya 'tāsu tadā bhavati yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na
GSP33brssbh3u:704: tathānyatra 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati svamapīto bhavati' (chā.
GSP33brssbh3u:706: 'prājñenātmanā saṃpariśvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana veda nāntaram' (bṛ. 4.3.21)
GSP33brssbh3u:708: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimetāni nāḍyādīni parasparanirapekṣāṇi bhinnāni suṣuptisthānānyāhosvitparasparāpekṣayaikaṃ suṣuptisthānamasti /
GSP33brssbh3u:712: nāḍyādīnāṃ tvekārthatā suṣuptau dṛśyate - 'nāḍīśu sṛpto bhavati' (chā.
GSP33brssbh3u:714: (bṛ. 2.1.19) iti ca tatra tatra saptamīnirdeśasya tulyatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:715: nanu naivaṃ sati saptamīnirdeśo dṛśyate - 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno
GSP33brssbh3u:720: 'anyatrāyatanamalabdhvā prāṇamevopaśrayate' (chā. 6.8.2) iti prāṇaśabdena tatra prakṛtasya sata upādanāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:722: saptamīnirdeśo 'pi tatra vākyaśeṣe dṛśyate - 'sati saṃpadya na viduḥ sati
GSP33brssbh3u:724: sarvatra ca viśeṣavijñānoparamalakṣaṇaṃ suṣuptaṃ na viśiṣyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:726: evaṃ prāpte pratipādyate - tadabhāvo nāḍīṣvātni ceti /
GSP33brssbh3u:727: tadabhāva iti tasya prakṛtasya svapnadarśanasyābhāvaḥ suṣuptamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:728: nāḍīṣvātmani ceti samuccayenaitāni nāḍyādīni svāpāyopaiti na vikalpenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:730: tathāhi - sarveṣāmeva nāḍyādīnāṃ tatra tatra suṣuptisthānatvaṃ śrūyate

GSP33brssbh3u:1081: yathā svargāmasya yāgo 'nuṣṭhātavya upadiśyata evamapavargakāmasya prapañcapravilayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1082: yathāca tamasi vyavasthitaṃ ghaṭāditattvamavabubhutsamānena tatpratyanīkabhūtaṃ tamaḥ pravilāpyata evaṃ brahmatattavamavabubhutsamānena tatpratyanīkabhūtaḥ prapañcaḥ pravilāpayitavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1083: brahmasvabhāvo hi prapañco na prapañcasvabhāvaṃ brahma, tena nāmarūpaprapañcapravilāpanena brahmatattvāvabodho bhavatīti /

GSP33brssbh3u:1086: tatra tāvadvidyāmano 'yaṃ prapañco dehādilakṣaṇa ādhyatmiko bāhyaśca pṛthivyādilakṣaṇaḥ pravilāpayitavya ityucyeta sa puruṣamātreṇāśakyaḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:1088: ekena cādimuktena pṛthivyādipravilayaḥ kṛta itīdānīṃ pṛthivyādiśūnyaṃ jagadabhaviṣyat /

GSP33brssbh3u:1092: anāvedite tu brahmaṇi brahmavijñānaṃ kuru prapañcapravilayaṃ ceti śatakṛtvo 'pyukte, na brahmavijñānaṃ prapañpapravilayo vā jāyate /

GSP33brssbh3u:2065: taittirīyakā api kañcitpuruṣayajñaṃ kalpayanavti - 'tasyaivaṃ viduṣo yajñasyātmā yajamānaḥ śraddhā patnī' (nārā. 80) ityetenānuvākena /
GSP33brssbh3u:2066: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ ya itaratroktāḥ puruṣayajñasya dharmāste taittirīyakeṣūpasaṃhartavyāḥ kiṃvā nopasaṃhartavyā iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2071: yathaikeṣāṃ śākhināṃ tāṇḍināṃ paiṅgināṃ ca puruṣavidyāyāmāmnānaṃ naivamitareṣāṃ taittirīyāṇāmāmnānamasti
GSP33brssbh3u:2075: yadapi kiñcinmaraṇāvabhṛthatvādisāmyaṃ tadapyalpīyastavādbhūyasā vailakṣaṇyenābhibhūyamānaṃ na pratyabhijñāpanakṣamam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2077: viduṣo yajñasyeti hi nacaite samānādhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyau vidvāneva yoyajñastasyeti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2079: vyadhikaraṇe tvete ṣaṣṭhyau viduṣo yo yajñastasyeti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2081: satyāṃ ca gatau mukhya evārtha āśrayitavyo na bhāktaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2082: ātmā yajamāna iti ca yajamānatvaṃ puruṣasya nirbruvanvaiyadhikaraṇyenaivāsya yajñasaṃbandhaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2083: apica tasyaivaṃviduṣaiti siddhavadanuvādaśrutau satyāṃ puruṣasya yajñabhāvamātmādīnāṃ ca yajamānādibhāvaṃ pratipitsamānasya vākyabhedaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2084: apica saṃsanyāsāmātmavidyāṃ purastādupadiśyānantaraṃ tasyaivaṃviduṣa ityādyanukramaṇaṃ phasyantaḥ pūrvaśeṣa evaiṣa āmnāyo na svatantra iti pratīmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2088: āyurabhivṛddhiphalo hyasau 'sa ha --ṣoḍaśaṃ varṣaśataṃ jīvati ya evaṃ
GSP33brssbh3u:2094: astyātharvaṇikānāmupaniṣadārambhe mantrasamāmnāyaḥ - 'sarvaṃ pravidhya hṛdayaṃ pravidhya dhamanīḥ pravṛjya śiro 'bhipravṛjyatridhā vipṛktaḥ'
GSP33brssbh3u:2098: kaṭhānāṃ taittirīyāṇāṃ - 'śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ' (tai. 1.1.1) ityādiḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:2099: vājasaneyināṃ tūpaniṣadārambhe pravargyabrāhmaṇaṃ paṭhyate - 'devā ha vai niṣeduḥ' ityādi
GSP33brssbh3u:2103: kimime sarve pravidhyamādayo mantrāḥ pravargyādīni ca karmāṇi vidyāsūpasaṃhriyerankiṃvā nopasaṃhriyeranniti mīmāṃsāmahe /
GSP33brssbh3u:2104: kiṃ tāvannaḥ pratibhāti upasaṃhāra evaiṣāṃ vidyāsviti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2111: nanu naiṣāṃ mantrāṇāṃ vidyāviṣayaṃ kiñcitsāmarthyaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2112: kathaṃ ca pravargyādīni karmāṇyanyārthatvenaiva viniyuktāni santi vidyārthatvenāpi pratipadyemahīti
GSP33brssbh3u:2114: sāmarthyaṃ tāvanmantrāṇāṃ vidyāviṣayamapi kiñcicchakyaṃ kalpayituṃ hṛdayādisaṃkīrtanāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2115: hṛdayādīni hi prayeṇopāsaneṣvāyatanādibhāvenopadiṣṭāni taddvāreṇa ca hṛdayaṃ pravidhyetyevañjātīyakānāṃ mantrāṇāmupapannamupāsanāṅgatvam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2118: tathā pravargyādīnāṃ karmaṇāmanyatrāpi viniyuktānāṃ satāmaviruddho vidyāsu viniyogo vājapeya iva bṛhaspatisavasyeti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2123: hṛdayaṃ pravidhyetyevañjātīyakānāṃ hi mantrāṇāṃ yer'thā hṛdayavedhādayo bhinnā anabhisaṃbaddhāsta upaniṣaduditābhirvidyābhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2127: hṛdayamātrasaṃkīrtanasya hyevamupayogaḥ kathañcidutprekṣyeta naca hṛdayamātramatra mantrārthaḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:2128: hṛdayaṃ pravidhya dhamanīḥ pravṛjyetyevañjātīyako hi na sakalo mantrārthe vidyābhirabhisaṃbadhyate
GSP33brssbh3u:2129: ābhicārikaviṣayo hyeṣor'thastasmādābhicārikeṇa karmaṇā sarvaṃ pravidhyetyetasya mantrasyābhisaṃbandhaḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:2131: evamanyeṣāmapi mantrāṇāṃ keṣācilliṅgena keṣāñcidvacanena keṣāñcitpramāṇāntareṇātyevamarthāntareṣu viniyuktānāṃ rahasyapaṭhitānāmapi satāṃ na saṃnidhimātreṇa vidyāśeṣatvopapattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2132: durbalo hi saṃnidhiḥ śrutyādibhya ityuktaṃ prathame tantre
GSP33brssbh3u:2139: api caiko 'yaṃ pravargyaḥ sakṛdutpanno balīyasā pramāṇenānyatra viniyukto na durbalena pramāṇenānyatrāpi viniyogamarhati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2140: agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatve hi pramāṇayoretadevaṃ syānnatu balavadabalavatoḥ pramāṇayoragṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatā saṃbhavati balavadabalavattvaviśeṣādeva /
GSP33brssbh3u:2141: tasmādevañjātīyakānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ vā na saṃnidhipāṭhamātreṇa vidyāśeṣatvamāśaṅkitavyam
GSP33brssbh3u:2145: hānau tūpāyanaśabdaśeṣatvāt kuśāc chandaḥstutyupagānavat tad uktam |
GSP33brssbh3u:2146: asti tāṇḍānāṃ śrutiḥ - 'aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpaṃ candra iva
GSP33brssbh3u:2151: tathā śāṭyāyaninaḥ paṭhanti 'tasya putrā dāyamupayanti sihṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāṃ dviṣantaḥ pāpakṛtyām' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2152: tathaiva kauṣītakinaḥ 'tatsukṛtaduṣkṛte vidhūnute tasya priyā jñātayaḥ sukṛtamupantyapriyā duṣkṛtam' (kau. 1.4) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2153: tadiha kvacitsukṛtaduṣkṛtayorhānaṃ śrūyate kvacittayoreva vibhāgena priyairapriyaiścopāyanaṃ kvacittūbhayamapi hānamupāyanaṃ ca tadyatrobhayaṃ śrūyate tatra tāvanna kiñcidvaktavyamasti yatrāpyupāyanameva śrūyate na hānaṃ tatrāpyarthādeva hānaṃ saṃnipatati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2155: yatra tu hānameva śrūyate nopāyanaṃ tatropāyanaṃ sanipatedvā na veti vicikitsāyāmaśravaṇādasaṃnipātaḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:2157: apicātmakartṛkaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayorhānaṃ parakartṛkaṃ tūpāyanaṃ tayorasatyāvaśyakabhāve kathaṃ hānenopāyamākṣipyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:2168: itthaṃ mahābhāgā vidyā yatsāmarthyādasya viduṣaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛte saṃsārakāraṇabhūte vidhūyate te cāsya suhṛdviṣatsu niviśete itai /
GSP33brssbh3u:2169: stutyarthe cāsminsaṃkīrtane hānānantarabhāvitvenopāyasya kvacicchrutatvādanyatrāpi hānaśrutāvupāyanānuvṛttiṃ manyate stutiprakarṣalābhāya /
GSP33brssbh3u:2171: kathaṃ hīhaikaviṃśatādityasyābhidhīyatānapekṣyamāṇer'thavādāntare dvādaśa māsāḥpañcartavastraya ime lokā asāvāditya ekaviṃśaḥ ityetasmin /
GSP33brssbh3u:2172: tathā triṣṭubhau bhavataḥ sendriyatvāya ityevamādiṣu indriyaṃ vai triṣṭup ityevamādyarthavādāntarāpekṣā dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2173: vidyāstutyarthatvāccāsyopāyanavādasya kathamanyadīye sukṛtaduṣkṛte anyairupeyete iti nātīvābhiniveṣṭavyam
GSP33brssbh3u:2174: upāyanaśabdaśeṣatvāditi tu śabdaśabdaṃ samuccārayanstutyarthameva hānāvupāyanānuvṛttiṃ sūcayati
GSP33brssbh3u:2178: tadyathā bhāllavinām - 'kuśā vānaspatyāḥ stha tā mā pāta' ityetasminnigame kuśānāmaviśeṣeṇa vanaspatiyonitvena śravaṇe śāṭyāyanināmaudumbarāḥ kuśā
GSP33brssbh3u:2185: yathaiteṣu kuśādiṣu śrutyantaragataviśeṣairanvaya evaṃ hānāvapyupāyanānvaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2186: śrutyantarakṛtaṃ hi viśeṣaṃ śrutyantare 'nabhyupagacchataḥ sarvatraiva vikalpaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2188: taduktaṃ dvādaśalakṣaṇāyām - 'api tu vākyaśeṣatvāditaraparyudāsaḥ syātpratiṣedhe vikalpaḥ syāt' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2193: na hānaṃ vidhūnanamabhidhīyate 'dhañ kampane' iti smaraṇāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2194: dodhūyante dhvajāgrāṇīti ca vāyunā cālyamāneṣu dhvajāgreṣu prayogadarśanāt
GSP33brssbh3u:2196: cālanaṃ tu suṣkṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ kañcitkālaṃ phalapratibandhanādityevaṃ prāpayya prativaktavyam
GSP33brssbh3u:2200: yadyapīdaṃ parakīyayoḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ parairupāyanaṃ nāñjasaṃ saṃbhāvyate tathāpi tatsarntanāttāvattadānuguṇyena hānameva vidhūnanaṃ nāmeti nirṇetuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2201: kvacidapi cedaṃ vidhūnanasaṃnidhāvupāyanaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ kuśāchandastutyupagānavadvidhanūnaśrutyā sarvatrāpekṣāmāṇaṃ sārvatrikaṃ nirṇayakāraṇaṃ saṃpadyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2204: aśvaśca romāṇi vidhūnvānastyajanrajaḥ sahaiva tena romāṇyapi jīrṇāni śātayati 'aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpam' (chā. 8.13.1) iti ca brāhmaṇam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2210: devayānena pathā paryaṅ kasthaṃ brahmābhiprastitasya vyadhvani sukṛtaduṣkṛtayorvibhāgaṃ kauṣītakinaḥ paryaṅ kavidyāyāmamananti 'sa etaṃ devayānaṃ pantānamāsādyāgnilokamāgacchati' (kau. 1.3) ityupakramya 'sa
GSP33brssbh3u:2211: āgacchati virajāṃ nadīṃ tāṃ manasaivātyeti tatsukṛtaduṣkṛte vidhūnute'
GSP33brssbh3u:2213: tatkiṃ yathāśrutaṃ vyadhvanyeva viyogavacanaṃ pratipattavyamāhosvidādāveva dehādapasarpaṇa iti vicāraṇāyāṃ śrutiprāmāṇyādyathāśruti pratipattiprasaktau paṭhati - sāṃparāya itai /
GSP33brssbh3u:2214: sāṃparāye gamana eva dehādapasarpaṇa idaṃ vidyāsāmarthyātsukṛtaduṣkṛtahānaṃ bhavatīti pratijānīte
GSP33brssbh3u:2216: nahi viduṣaḥ saṃparetasya vidyayā brahma saṃprepsato 'ntarāle
GSP33brssbh3u:2217: sukṛtaduṣkṛtābhyāṃ kiñcitprāptavyamasti yadarthaṃ katicitkṣaṇānakṣīṇe te kalpeyātām /
GSP33brssbh3u:2218: vidyāviruddhaphalatvāttu vidyāsāmarthyena tayoḥ kṣayaḥ sa ca yadaiva vidyā phalābhimukhī tadaiva bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2222: iti, 'tasya putrā dāyamupayanti suhṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāṃ dviṣantaḥ pāpakṛtyām'
GSP33brssbh3u:2225: yadi ca dehādapasṛptasya devayānena pathā prasthitasyārdhapathe sukṛtaduṣkṛtakṣayo 'bhyupagamyeta tataḥ patite dehe
GSP33brssbh3u:2226: yamaniyamavidyābhyāsātmakasya sukṛtaduṣkṛtakṣayahetoḥ puruṣaprayatnasyecchāto 'nuṣṭhānānupapatteranupapattireva taddhetukasya sukṛtaduṣkṛtakṣayasya syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2234: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ hānāvaviśeṣeṇaiva devayānaḥ panthāḥ saṃnipateduta vibhāgena kvacitsaṃnipatet kvacinneti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2236: gaterdevayānasya pathor'thavattvamubhayathā vibhāgena bhavitumarhati kvacidarthavatī gatiḥ kvacinneti nāviśeṣeṇa /
GSP33brssbh3u:2238: 'puṇyapārape vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti' (mu. 3.1.3) ityasyāṃ śrutau deśāntaraprāpaṇī gatirvirudhyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:2240: gantavyaṃ ca paramaṃ sāmyaṃ na deśāntaraprāptyāyattamityānarthakyamevātra gatermanyāmahe // upapannas tallakṣaṇārthopalabdher lokavat |
GSP33brssbh3u:2244: yatra hi paryaṅ kārohaṇaṃ paryaṅ kastena brahmaṇā saṃvadanaṃ viśiṣṭagandhādi prāptiścetyevamādi bahu deśāntaraprāptyāyattaṃ phalaṃ śrūyate tatrārthavatī gatiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2247: lokavaccaiṣa vibhāgo draṣṭavyo yathā loke grāmaprāptau deśāntaraprāpaṇaḥ panthā apekṣyate nārogyaprāptāvevamihāpīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2252: saguṇāsu vidyāsu gatirarthavatī na nirguṇāyāṃ paramātmavidyāyāmityukhtam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2253: saguṇāsvapi vidyāsu kāsucidgatiḥ śrūyate yathā paryaṅ kavidyāyāmupakosalavidyāyāṃ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ daharavidyāyāmiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2254: nānyāsu yathā madhuvidyāyāṃ śāṇḍilyavidyāyāṃ ṣoḍaṣakalavidyāyāṃ vaiśvānaravidyāyāmiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2255: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ yāsvevaiṣā gatiḥ śrūyate tāsveva niyamyetotāniyamena
GSP33brssbh3u:2260: yadyanyatra śrūyamāṇāpi gatirvidyāntaraṃ gacchecchrutyādīnāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ hīyeta sarvasya sarvārthatvaprasaṅgāt
GSP33brssbh3u:2261: apicārcirādikaikaiva gatirupakosalavidyāyāṃ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ ca tulyavatpaṭhyate tatsarvārthatve 'narthakaṃ punarvacanaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2262: tasmānniyama ityevaṃ prāpte paṭhati - aniyama iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2266: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'tadya itthaṃ viduḥ' (chā. 5.10.1) iti pañcāgnividyāvatāṃ devayānaṃ panthānamavatārayantī 'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate'
GSP33brssbh3u:2271: nahi kevalābhyāṃ śraddātapobhyāmantareṇa vidyābalameṣā gatirlabhyate 'vidyayā tadārohanti yatra kāmāḥ parāgatāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2272: na tatra dakṣiṇā yanti nāvidvāṃsastapasvinaḥ' iti śrutyantarāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2274: vājasaneyinastu pañcāgnividyādhikāre 'dhīyate - 'ya evametadvidurye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyamupāsate' (bṛ. 6.2.15) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2275: tatra śraddhalavo ye satyaṃ brahmopāsata iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2278: 'atha ya etau panthānau na viduste pataṅgā yadidaṃ dandaśūkam' (bṛ.
GSP33brssbh3u:2281: samṛtirapi - 'śuklakṛṣṇe gatī hyete jagataḥ śāśvate mate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2283: yatpunardevayānasya patho dvirāmnānamupakosalavidyāyāṃ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ ca tadubhayatrāpyanucintanārtham
GSP33brssbh3u:2290: viduṣo vartamānadehapātānantaraṃ dehāntaramutpadyate na veti cintyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2291: nanu vidyāyāḥ sādhanabhūtāyāḥ saṃpattau kaivalyanirvṛttiḥ syānna veti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2293: nahi pākasādanasaṃpattāvodano bhavenna veti cintā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2296: tathāhyapāntaratamā nāma vedācāryaḥ purāṇarṣirviṣṇuniyogātkalidvāparayoḥ saṃdhau kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ saṃbabhūveti smaranti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2297: vasiṣṭhaśca brahmaṇo mānasaḥ putraḥ sannimiśāpādapagatapūrvadehaḥ punarbrahmādeśānmitrāvaruṇābhyāṃ saṃbabhūveti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2298: bhṛgvādināmapi brahmaṇa eva mānasaputrāṇāṃ vāruṇe yajñe punarutpattiḥ śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2299: sanatkumāro 'pi brahmaṇa eva mānasaḥ putraḥ svayaṃ rudrāya
GSP33brssbh3u:2301: evameva dakṣanāradaprabhṛtīnāṃ bhūyasī dehāntarotpattiḥ kathyate tena tena nimittena smṛtau
GSP33brssbh3u:2303: te ca kecitpatite pūrvadehe dehāntaramādadatte kecittu sthita eva tasminyogaiśvaryavaśādanekadehādānanyāyena
GSP33brssbh3u:2305: tadeteṣāṃ dehāntarotpattidarśanātprāptaṃ brahmavidyāyāḥ pākṣikaṃ mokṣahetutvamahetutvaṃ veti
GSP33brssbh3u:2309: yathāsau bhagavānsavitā sahsrayugaparyantaṃ jagato 'dhikāraṃ caritvā tadavasāna udayāstamayavarjitaṃ kaivalyamanubhavati 'atha tata ūrdhvaṃ udetya naivodetā nāstametaikala eva madhye sthātā' (chā. 3.11.1) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2311: 'tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsye' (chā. 6.14.2) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2313: niyuktāḥ santaḥ satyapi samyagdarśane kaivalyahetāvakṣīṇakarmāṇo yāvadadhaikāramavatiṣṭhante, tadavasāne cāpavṛjyanta ityaviruddham /
GSP33brssbh3u:2314: sakṛtpravṛttameva hi te phaladānāya karmāśayamativāhayantaḥ svātantryeṇaiva gṛhādiva gṛhāntaramanyamanyaṃ dehaṃ saṃcarantaḥ svādhikāranivartanāyāparimuṣitasmṛtaya eva dehendriyaprakṛtivaśitvānnirmāya dehānyugapatkrameṇa vādhitiṣṭhanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2315: nacaite jātismarā ityucyante 'ta evaite' iti smṛtiprasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2316: yathāhi sulabhā nāma brahmavādinī janakena vivaditukāmākhyudasya svaṃ dehaṃ jānakaṃ dehamāviśya vyudya tena paścātsvameva dehamāviveśeti smaryate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2317: yadi hyapayukte sakṛtpravṛtte karmaṇi karmāntaraṃ dehāntarārambhakāraṇamāvirbhavettato 'nyadapyadagdhabījaṃ karmāntaraṃ tadvadeva prasajyeteti brahmavidyāyāḥ pākṣikaṃ mokṣahetutvamahetutvaṃ
GSP33brssbh3u:2318: vāśaṅkyeta, natviyamāśah kā yuktā, jñānātkarmabījadāhasya śrutismṛtiprasiddhatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2320: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmindṛṣṭe parāvare' (muṇḍa. 2.2.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2325: jñānadagdhaistathā kleśairnātmā saṃpadyate punaḥ' iti caivamādyā /
GSP33brssbh3u:2332: tathāca śrutiraviśeṣeṇaiva sarveṣāṃ jñānānmokṣaṃ darśayati 'tadyo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tadabhavattatharṣīṇāṃ tathā manuṣyāṇām' (bṛ.

GSP33brssbh3u:2690: tatra prakaraṇākriyānupraveśe prāpte svātantryaṃ tāvatpratijānīte liṅgabhayastvāditi /
GSP33brssbh3u:2691: bhūyāṃsi hiliṅgānyasminbrāhmaṇe kevalavidyātmakatvameṣāmupodbalayanti dṛśyante tadyatkiñcemāni bhūtāni manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmeva sā kṛtiḥ iti, 'tānhaitānevaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni cinvantyapi svapate' iti caivañjātīyakāni /
GSP33brssbh3u:2697: pūrvasya kriyāmayasyāgneḥ prakaraṇāttadviṣaya evāyaṃ vikalpaviśeṣopadeśaḥ syānna svatantraḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:2703: anyārthadarśanaṃ cāsatyāmanyasyāṃ prāptau guṇavādenāpyupapadyamānaṃ na prakaraṇaṃ bādhitumutsahate
GSP33brssbh3u:2706: yathā daśarātrasya dasaṇe 'hanyavivākye pṛthivyā pātreṇa samudrasya
GSP33brssbh3u:2708: sa ca mānaso 'pi grahakalpaḥ kriyāprakaraṇātkriyāśeṣa eva
GSP33brssbh3u:2719: vidyātmakā evaite svatantrā manaścidādayo 'gnayaḥ syurna kriyāśeṣabhūtāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2720: tathāhi nirdhārayati - 'te haite vidyācita eva' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2721: vidyayā haivaita evaṃvidaścitā bhavanti iti ca // 47 //
GSP33brssbh3u:2725: nanu liṅgamapyasatyāṃmanyasyāṃ prāptāvasādhakaṃ kasyacidarthasyetyapāsya tatprakaraṇasāmarthyātkriyāśeṣatvamadhyavasitamityata uttaraṃ paṭhati -
GSP33brssbh3u:2733: tathā liṅm 'sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni cinvantyapi svapate' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2735: 'vidyācita eva' iti hi sāvadhāraṇeyaṃ śrutiḥ kriyānupraveśe 'mīṣāmabhyupagamyamāne pīḍitā syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2738: tadabhiprāyatāyāṃ hividyocita itīyatā svarūpasamakīrtanenaiva kṛtatvādanarthakamavadhāraṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssbh3u:2744: yathā sāṃpādike vākyaprāṇamaye 'gnihotre 'prāṇaṃ tadā vāci juhoti - vācaṃ tadā prāṇe juhoti' (kau. 2.5) iti coktvocyate - 'ete anante āhutī jāgracca
GSP33brssbh3u:2747: kriyānupraveśe tu kriyāprayogasyālpakālatvena na sātatyeṣāṃ prayogaḥ kalpeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:2749: yatra hi vispaṣṭo vidhāyako liṅgādirupalabhyate yuktaṃ tatra saṃkīrtanamātrasyārthavādatvam
GSP33brssbh3u:2750: iha hi vispaṣṭovidhyantarānupalabdheḥ saṃkīrtanādevaiṣāṃ vijñānavidhānaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2751: tacca yathāsaṃkīrtanameva kalpayituṃ śakyata iti sātatyadarśanāttathābhūtameva kalpyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2753: etena tadyatkiñcemāni bhūtāni manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmeva sā kṛtiḥ ityādi vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2754: tathā vākyamapi evaṃvide iti puruṣaviśeṣasaṃbandhamevaiṣāmācakṣaṇaṃ na kratusaṃbandhaṃ mṛṣyate
GSP33brssbh3u:2758: yatkriyāvayavānmana-ādivyāpāreṣvanubadhnāti 'te manasaivādhīyanta manasācīyanta manasaiva grahā agṛhyanta manasāstuvanmanasāśaṃsanyatkiñca
GSP33brssbh3u:2759: yajñe karma kriyate yatkiñca yajñiyaṃ karma manasaiva teṣu tanmanomayeṣu manaścitsu manomayameva kriyate' ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh3u:2761: naca pratyakṣāḥ kriyāvayavāḥ santaḥ saṃpadā lipsitavyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2763: nahyatra kriyāṅgaṃ kiñcidādāya tasminnado nāmādhyavasitavyamiti vadati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2764: ṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇi tu manovṛttibhedānādāya teṣvagnitvaṃ grahādīṃśca kalpayati puruṣayādivat
GSP33brssbh3u:2765: saṃkhyā ceyaṃ puruṣāyuṣasyāhaḥsu dṛṣṭā satī tatsaṃbandhinīṣu manovṛttiṣvāropyata iti draṣṭavyam
GSP33brssbh3u:2768: tathāhi - 'teṣāmekaika eva tāvānyānānasau pūrvaḥ' iti kriyāmayasyāgnermāhātmyaṃ jñānamayānāmekaikasyātidiśankiriyāyāmanādaraṃ
GSP33brssbh3u:2770: naca satyeva kriyāsaṃbandhe vikalpaḥ pūrveṇottareṣāmiti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP33brssbh3u:2771: nahi yena vyāpāreṇāhanīyadhāraṇādinā pūrvaḥ kriyāyāmupakaroti tenottara upakartuṃ śaknuvanti
GSP33brssbh3u:2772: yattu pūrvapakṣe 'pyatideśa upodbalaka ityuktaṃ sati hi sāmānye 'tideśaḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:2778: yathā prajñāntarāṇi śāṇḍilyavidyāprabhṛtīni svena svenānubadhyamānāni pṛthageva karmabhyaḥ prajñāntarebhyaśca svatantrāṇi bhavantyevamiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2790: yathā 'sa vā eṣa eva mṛtyurya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ' iti 'agnirvai
GSP33brssbh3u:2791: mṛtyuḥ' (bṛ. 3.2.10) iti cāgnyādityapuruṣayoḥ samāne 'pi mṛtyuśabdaprayoge nātyantasāmyāpattiḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:2792: yathā ca 'asau vāva loko gautamāgnistasyāditya eva samit' (chā. 5.4.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:2794: pareṇa ca śabdasya tādvidhyaṃ bhūyastvāt tv anubandhaḥ |
GSP33brssbh3u:2795: parastādapi 'ayaṃ vāva loka eṣo 'gniścittaḥ' ityasminnanantare brāhmaṇe tāvadvadhyaṃ kevalavidyāvidhitvaṃ śabdasya prayojanaṃ lakṣyate na
GSP33brssbh3u:2797: tatra hi -' vidyayā tadārohanti yatra kāmāḥ parāgatāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2798: na tatra dakṣīṇā yanti nāvidvāṃsastapasvinaḥ' ityanena ślokena kevalaṃ
GSP33brssbh3u:2800: tathā purastādapi yadetanmaṇḍalaṃ tapati ityasminbrāhmaṇe vidyāpradhānatvameva lakṣyate so 'mṛto bhavati mṛtyurhyasyātmā bhavati iti vidyāphalenaivopasaṃhārānna karmapradhānatā tatsāmānyādihāpi tathātvam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2801: bhūyāṃsastvagnyavayavāḥ saṃpādayitavyā vidyāyāmityetasmātkāraṇādagninānubadhyate vidyā na karmāṅgatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2807: nahyasati dehavyatiriktātmani paralokāścodanā upapajadyerankasya vā brahmātmatvamupadiśyeta
GSP33brssbh3u:2808: nanu śāstrapramukha eva prathame pāde śāstraphalopabhogyasya dehāvyatiriktasyātmano 'stitvamuktam
GSP33brssbh3u:2810: iha tu svayameva sūtrakṛtā tadastitvamākṣepapuraḥsaraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2811: ita eva cākṛṣyācāryeṇa śabarasvāminā pramāṇalakṣaṇe varṇitam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2812: ata eva ca bhagavatopavarṣeṇa prathame tantra ātmāstitvābhidhānaprasaktau śārīrake vakṣyamāḥ ityuddhāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2813: iha cedaṃ codanālakṣaṇeṣūpāsaneṣu vicāryamāṇeṣvātmāstitvaṃ vicāryate kṛtsnaśāstraśeṣatvapradarśanāya
GSP33brssbh3u:2814: apica pūrvasminnadhikaraṇe prakaraṇotkarṣābhyupagamena manaścidādīnāṃ puruṣārthatvaṃ varṇitaṃ ko 'sau puruṣo yadarthā ete manaścidādaya ityasyāṃ prasaktāvidaṃ dehavyatiriktasyātmano 'stitvamucyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2816: ākṣepapūrvikā hi parihāroktirvivakṣiter'the sthūṇānikhanananyāyena dṛḍhāṃ buddhimutpādayati
GSP33brssbh3u:2818: manyamānāḥ samastavyasteṣu bāhyeṣu pṛthivyādiṣvadṛṣṭamapi caitanyaṃ śarīrākārapariṇateṣu bhūteṣu syāditi saṃbhāvayantastebhyaścaitanyaṃ madaśaktivadvijñānaṃ caitanyaviśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ puruṣa iti cāhuḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2819: na svargagamanāyāpavargagamanāya vā samartho dehavyatirikta ātmāsti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2821: yaddhi yasminsati bhavatyasati ca na bhavati tattaddharmatvenādhyavasīte yathāgnidharmāvauṣṇyaprakāśau
GSP33brssbh3u:2823: 'pyantareva deha upalabhyamānā bahiścānupalabhyamānā asiddhe dehavyatirikte dharmiṇi dehadharmā eva bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2830: yadi dehabhāve bhāvāddehadharmatvamātmadharmāṇāṃ manyeta tato dehabhāve
GSP33brssbh3u:2834: prāṇaceṣṭādayastu satyapi dehe mṛtāvasthāyāṃ na bavanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2836: apica sati hi tāvaddehe jīvadavasthāyāmeṣāṃ bhāvaḥ śakyate niścetuṃ natvasatyabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2839: kimātmakaṃ ca punaridaṃ caitanyaṃ manyate yasya bhūtebhya utpattimicchatīti paraḥ paryanuyoktavyaḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:2842: tarhi viṣayatvātteṣāṃ na taddharmatvamaśnuvīta svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2845: nahi bhūtabhautikadharmeṇa satā caitanyena bhūtabhautikāni viṣayīkriyeran
GSP33brssbh3u:2849: upalabdhisvarūpa eva ca na ātmetyātmano dehavyatiriktatvam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2853: yattūktaṃ śarīre bhāvāccharīradharma upalabdairiti tadvarṇitena prakāreṇa pratyuktam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2856: evaṃ sati deha upalabdhirbhavatyasati ca na bhavatīti na dehadharmau bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2864: samāptā prāsaṅgikī kathā, saṃprati tu prakṛtāmevānuvartāmahe -
GSP33brssbh3u:2866: 1.1.1) 'lokeṣu pañcavidhaṃ sāmopāsīta' (chā. 2.1.1), 'ukthamukthamiti vai prajā vadanti tadidamevoktham', 'iyameva pṛthivī', 'ayaṃ vāva loka eṣo
GSP33brssbh3u:2867: 'gniścitaḥ' ityevamādyā ya udgīthādikarmāṅgāvabaddhāḥ pratyayāḥ prativedaṃ śākhābhedeṣu vihitāste tattacchākhāgateṣvevodgīthādiṣu bhaveyurathavā sarvaśākhāgateṣviti viśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2870: 'udgīthamupāsīta' (chā. 1.1.1) iti hi sāmānyavihitānāṃ viśṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ saṃnikṛṣṭenaiva svaśākhāgatena viśeṣaṇākāṅkṣādinivṛtteḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2878: svaśākhāvyavasthāyāṃ hyudgīthamupāsīteti sāmnyaśrutiraviśeṣapravṛttā satī saṃnidhānavaśena viśeṣe vyavasthāpyamānā pīḍitā syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2887: tathāhi mantrāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ guṇānāṃ ca śākhāntarotpannānāmapi śākhāntara upasaṃgraho dṛśyate
GSP33brssbh3u:2888: yeṣāmapi hi śākhināṃ kuṭarurasītyaśmādānamantro nāmnātasteṣāmapyasau viniyogo dṛśyate kukkuṭarasītyaśmādānamantro nāmnātasteṣāmapyasau viniyogo dṛśyate kukkuṭo 'sītyaśmādānamādatte kudarurasīti veti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2889: yeṣāmapi samidādayaḥ prayājaḍā nāmnātasteṣāmapi teṣu guṇavidhirāmnāyate -
GSP33brssbh3u:2890: ṛtavo vai prayājāḥ samānatra hotavyāḥ iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2891: tathā yeṣāmapi ajo 'gnīṣomīyaḥ iti jātiviśeṣopadeśo nāsti teṣāmapi tadviṣayo mantravarṇa upalabhyate - chāgasya vapāyā medaso 'nurbrūhi iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2894: tathābahvṛcapaṭhitasya sūktasya yo jāta eva prathamo manasvān (ṛ.saṃ
GSP33brssbh3u:2895: 2.6.7) ityasya adhvaryave sajanīyaṃ śasyam ityatra parigraho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2899: 'prācīnaśāla aupamanyavaḥ' (chā. 5.11.1) ityasyāmākhyāyikāyāṃ vyastasya samastasya ca vaiśvānarasyopāsanaṃ śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2900: vyastopāsanaṃ tāvat 'aupamanyava kaṃ tvamātmānamupāḥsa iti devameva bhagavo rājanniti hovācaiṣa vai sutejā ātmā vaiśvānaro yaṃ
GSP33brssbh3u:2902: tathā samastopāsanamapi 'tasya ha vā etasyātmano vaiśvānarasyamūrdhaiva sutejāścakṣurviśvarūpa prāṇaḥ pṛthagvartmātmā saṃdeho bahulo bastireva rayiḥ pṛthivyeva pādau' (chā. 5.18.2) ityādi tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimihobhayathāpyupāsanaṃ syādvyastasya samastasya cota smastasyaiveti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2908: vaiśvānaropāsanasya jyāyastvaṃ prādhānyamasminvākye vivakṣitaṃ bhavitumarhati na pratyekamavayavopāsanānāmapi
GSP33brssbh3u:2910: yathā kratuṣu darśapūrṇamāsāprabhṛtiṣu sāmastyena sāṅgapradhānaprayoga evaikovivakṣyate na vyastānāmapi prayogaḥ prayājādīnām /
GSP33brssbh3u:2916: vaiśvānaravidyāyāṃ pariniṣṭhamapratipadyamānā aśvapatiṃ kaikeyaṃ rājānamabhyājagmurityupakramyaikaikasyarṣerupāsyaṃ dyuprabhṛtīnāmekaikaṃ śrāvayitvā 'mūrdhā tveṣa ātmana iti hovāca' (chā. 5.12.2) ityādinā mūrdhādibhāvaṃ teṣāṃ vidadhāti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2918: punaśca vyastopāsanaṃ vyāvartya samastopāsanamevānuvartya 'sa sarveṣu lokeṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu sarveṣvātmasvannamatti' (chā. 5.18.1) iti bhūmāśrayameva phalaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2919: yattu pratyekaṃ sutejaḥprabhṛtiṣu phalabhedaśravaṇaṃ tadevaṃ satyaṅgaphalāni pradhāna evābhyupagatānīti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2920: tathopāḥsa ityapi pratyavayavamākhyātaśravaṇaṃ parābhiprāyānuvādārthaṃ na vyastopāsanavidhānārtham
GSP33brssbh3u:2922: kecittvatra samastopāsanapakṣaṃ jyāyāṃsaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya jyāyastvavacanādeva kila vyastopāsanapakṣamapi sūtrakāro 'numanyata iti kathayanti tadayuktam
GSP33brssbh3u:2925: spaṣṭo copāsaṃhārasthe samastopāsanāvagame tadabhāvasya pūrvapakṣe vaktumaśakyatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2930: pūrvasminnadhikaraṇe satyamapi sutejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ phalabhedaśrutau samastopāsanaṃ jyāya ityuktam
GSP33brssbh3u:2931: ataḥ prāptā buddhiranyānyapi bhinnaśrutīnyupāsanāni samasyopāśiṣyanta iti
GSP33brssbh3u:2932: apica naiva vedyābhede vidyābhedo vijñātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2933: vedyaṃ hi rūpaṃ vidyāyā dravyadaivatamiva yāgasya /
GSP33brssbh3u:2937: tathā eka eva prāṇaḥ prāṇo vāva saṃvargaḥ' (chā. 4.3.3) 'prāṇo vāva jyeṣṭhaśca śreṣṭhaśca' (chā. 5.1.1) 'prāṇo ha pitā prāṇo mātā' (chā.
GSP33brssbh3u:2947: śabdabhedāśca karmabhedahetuḥ samadhigataḥ purastācchabdāntare karmabhedaḥ kṛtānubandhatvāditi
GSP33brssbh3u:2949: nanu vedetyādiṣu śabdabheda evāvagamyate na yajatītyādivadarthabhedaḥ sarveṣāmevaiṣāṃ manovṛttyarthatvābhedāt arthāntarāsaṃbhavācca /
GSP33brssbh3u:2956: nacātraiko vidyāvidhiritare guṇavidhaya iti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP33brssbh3u:2959: nacāsminpakṣe samānāḥ santaḥ satyakāmādayo guṇā asakṛcchrāvayitavyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2961: nacātra vaiśvānaravidyāyāmiva samastacodanāparāsti yadbalena pratiprakaraṇavartinyavayavopāsanāni bhūtvaikavākyatāmiyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2962: vidyaikatvanimitte ca vidyaikatve sarvatra niraṅ kuśe pratijñāyamāne samastaguṇopasaṃhāro 'śakyaḥ pratijñāyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:2968: sthite vidyābhede vicāryate kimāsāmicchayā samuccayo vikalpo vā syāt,
GSP33brssbh3u:2973: nityatāśrutirhi tatra kāraṇaṃ naivaṃ vidyānāṃ kācinnityatāśrutirasti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2979: tathāhi - manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīraḥ (chā. 3.14.2) 'kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma'
GSP33brssbh3u:2984: tasmādyathākāmyaprāptāvucyate vikalpa evāsāṃ bhavitumarhati na samuccayaḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:2988: ekena copāsanena sākṣātkṛ upāsye viṣaya īśvarādau dvitīyamanarthakam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2994: tasmādaviśiṣṭaphalānāṃ vidyānāmanyatamāmādāya tatparaḥ syādyāvadupāsyaviṣayasākṣātkaramena tatphalaṃ prāptamiti // 59 //
GSP33brssbh3u:2999: yāsu punaḥ kāmyāsu vidyāsu 'sa ya etamevaṃ vāyuṃ diśāṃ vatsaṃ veda na putrarodaṃ roditi' (chā. 3.15.2) 'sa yo nāma brahmetyupāste yāvannāmno gataṃ tatrāsya yatākāmacāro bhavati' (chā. 7.1.5) iti caivamādyāsu kriyāvadadṛṣṭenātmanātmīyaṃ phalaṃ sādhayantīṣu sākṣātkaraṇāpekṣā nāsti tā yatākāmaṃ samuccīyeranna vā samuccīyeranpūrvahetvābhāvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:3004: karmāṅgeṣūdgīthādiṣu ya āśritāḥ pratyayā vedatrayavihitāḥ kiṃ te samuccīyerankiṃvā yathākāmaṃ syuriti saṃśaye yathāśrayabhāva ityāha /
GSP33brssbh3u:3005: yataivaiṣāmāśrayāḥ stotrādayaḥ saṃbhūya bhavantyevaṃ pratyayā api āśrayatantratvātpratyayānām śiṣṭeś ca |
GSP33brssbh3u:3006: yathā vāśrayāḥ stotrādayastriṣu śiṣyanta evamāśritā api pratyayāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3009: hotṛṣadanāddhaivāpi durudgīthamanusamāharati (chā. 1.5.5) iti ca praṇavodgīthaikatvāvijñānamāhātmyādudgātāsvakarmaṇayutpannaṃ kṣataṃ hotrātkarmaṇaḥ pratisamādadhātīti bruvanvedāntaroditasya pratyayasya vedāntaroditapadārthasaṃbandhasāmānyātsravavedoditapratyayopasaṃhārasūcayatīti liṅgadarśanam // 63//
GSP33brssbh3u:3016: yadīme karmaguṇā udgīthādayaḥ sarve sarvaprayogasādhāraṇā na syurna syāttatastadāśrayāṇāṃ pratyayānāṃ sahabhāvaḥ /

GSP33brssbh3u:3754: purastāt' (muṇḍa. 2.2.11) 'idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā' (bṛ. 2.4.6) 'sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmājaro 'maro 'mṛto 'bhayo brahma' (bṛ. 4.4.25) 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' (bṛ. 4.5.15) ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3755: apica vidyāsādhanaṃ svavīryaviśeṣāsvaphala eva vidyāyāṃ kañcidatiśayamāsañjayenna vidyāphale muktau /
GSP33brssbh3u:3757: naca tasyāmapyutkarṣanikarṣātmako 'tiśaya upapadyate nikṛṣṭāyā vidyātvābhāvādutkṛṣṭaiva hi vidyā bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:3762: saguṇāsu tu vidyāsu - 'manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīraḥ' (chā. 3.14.2) ityādyāsu guṇāvāpodvāpavaśādbhedopapattau satyāmupapadyate yathāsvaṃ phalabhedaniyamaḥ karmaphalavat /
GSP33brssbh3u:3763: tathāca liṅgadarśanam - 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate tadeva bhavati' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3765: tathāca smṛtiḥ - 'nahi gatiradhikāsti kasyacitsati hi guṇe
